languages.text: This creature is connected via the Psyber-Raven powers. Upon suffering the next damage instance, {uip|SharedDamage|1054900271274ed5a11b7a8c5b1406d8}% of that damage (up to a maximum of 100%) is also dealt to the other connected targets as mental damage.

traits.locale_text: This creature is connected via the Psyber-Raven powers. Upon suffering the next damage instance, {uip|SharedDamage|1054900271274ed5a11b7a8c5b1406d8}% of that damage (up to a maximum of 100%) is also dealt to the other connected targets as mental damage.

languages.text: This creature is connected to the psyber-raven. When this creature suffers the next instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {uip|SharedDamage|1054900271274ed5a11b7a8c5b1406d8}% of that damage (up to a maximum of 100%) will be dealt to all the connected targets as {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. Once triggered, this effect is removed.
languages.original_text: Это существо связано с псайбервороном. Когда оно в следующий раз получит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, все связанные с этим псайбервороном существа получат {uip|SharedDamage|1054900271274ed5a11b7a8c5b1406d8}% от этого урона (до 100%) в виде {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического урона{/g}. После срабатывания эффект снимается.

traits.locale_text: This creature is connected to the psyber-raven. When this creature suffers the next instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {uip|SharedDamage|1054900271274ed5a11b7a8c5b1406d8}% of that damage (up to a maximum of 100%) will be dealt to all the connected targets as {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. Once triggered, this effect is removed.

This creature is connected to the psyber-raven. When this creature suffers the next instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {uip|SharedDamage|1054900271274ed5a11b7a8c5b1406d8}% of that damage (up to a maximum of 100%) will be dealt to all the connected targets as {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. Once triggered, this effect is removed.

languages.text: Esta criatura está conectada al psicocuervo. La próxima vez que esta criatura sufra {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, un {uip|SharedDamage|1054900271274ed5a11b7a8c5b1406d8} % de ese daño (hasta un máximo del 100 %) se infligirá como {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g} a todos los objetivos conectados. Este efecto se elimina después de activarse.
languages.original_text: This creature is connected to the psyber-raven. When this creature suffers the next instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {uip|SharedDamage|1054900271274ed5a11b7a8c5b1406d8}% of that damage (up to a maximum of 100%) will be dealt to all the connected targets as {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. Once triggered, this effect is removed.

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura está conectada al psicocuervo. La próxima vez que esta criatura sufra {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, un {uip|SharedDamage|1054900271274ed5a11b7a8c5b1406d8} % de ese daño (hasta un máximo del 100 %) se infligirá como {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g} a todos los objetivos conectados. Este efecto se elimina después de activarse.

languages.text: 此生物与生化渡鸦之间建立了联结。当此生物下次承受{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，该伤害的{uip|SharedDamage|1054900271274ed5a11b7a8c5b1406d8}%（最多100%）会作为{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}传导至所有与生化渡鸦建立联结的目标。此效果触发后移除。
languages.original_text: This creature is connected to the psyber-raven. When this creature suffers the next instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {uip|SharedDamage|1054900271274ed5a11b7a8c5b1406d8}% of that damage (up to a maximum of 100%) will be dealt to all the connected targets as {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. Once triggered, this effect is removed.

traits.locale_text: 此生物与生化渡鸦之间建立了联结。当此生物下次承受{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，该伤害的{uip|SharedDamage|1054900271274ed5a11b7a8c5b1406d8}%（最多100%）会作为{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}传导至所有与生化渡鸦建立联结的目标。此效果触发后移除。

languages.text: Cette créature est liée à la psyber-corneille. Lorsque cette créature subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, {uip|SharedDamage|1054900271274ed5a11b7a8c5b1406d8} % de ces dégâts (limités à 100 %) seront également infligés aux autres cibles liées, sous forme de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g}. Une fois cet effet déclenché, il est dissipé.
languages.original_text: This creature is connected to the psyber-raven. When this creature suffers the next instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {uip|SharedDamage|1054900271274ed5a11b7a8c5b1406d8}% of that damage (up to a maximum of 100%) will be dealt to all the connected targets as {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. Once triggered, this effect is removed.

traits.locale_text: Cette créature est liée à la psyber-corneille. Lorsque cette créature subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, {uip|SharedDamage|1054900271274ed5a11b7a8c5b1406d8} % de ces dégâts (limités à 100 %) seront également infligés aux autres cibles liées, sous forme de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g}. Une fois cet effet déclenché, il est dissipé.

languages.text: Bu yaratık, ruhsiber kuzguna bağlı. Yaratık, yeni bir {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} silsilesine maruz kaldığında bu hasarın %{uip|SharedDamage|1054900271274ed5a11b7a8c5b1406d8} kadarı (maksimum %100) bağlı tüm hedeflere {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}zihinsel hasar{/g} olarak verilir. Etki, tetiklendiğinde ortadan kalkar.

Это существо связано с псайбервороном. Когда оно в следующий раз получит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, все связанные с этим псайбервороном существа получат {uip|SharedDamage|1054900271274ed5a11b7a8c5b1406d8}% от этого урона (до 100%) в виде {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического урона{/g}. languages.text: このクリーチャーはサイバー・レイヴンとつながっている。このクリーチャーが次に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g} を受けたとき、{uip|SharedDamage|1054900271274ed5a11b7a8c5b1406d8} そのダメージの％（最大100％）は、{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神ダメージ{/g} として、他の接続している対象にも与えられる。この効果は一度誘発すると解除される。
languages.original_text: This creature is connected to the psyber-raven. When this creature suffers the next instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {uip|SharedDamage|1054900271274ed5a11b7a8c5b1406d8}% of that damage (up to a maximum of 100%) will be dealt to all the connected targets as {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. Once triggered, this effect is removed.

traits.locale_text: このクリーチャーはサイバー・レイヴンとつながっている。このクリーチャーが次に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g} を受けたとき、{uip|SharedDamage|1054900271274ed5a11b7a8c5b1406d8} そのダメージの％（最大100％）は、{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神ダメージ{/g} として、他の接続している対象にも与えられる。この効果は一度誘発すると解除される。

このクリーチャーはサイバー・レイヴンとつながっている。このクリーチャーが次に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g} を受けたとき、{uip|SharedDamage|1054900271274ed5a11b7a8c5b1406d8} そのダメージの％（最大100％）は、{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神ダメージ{/g} として、他の接続している対象にも与えられる。この効果は一度誘発すると解除される。

languages.text: Diese Kreatur ist mit dem Psitech-Raben verbunden. Erleidet diese Kreatur das nächste Mal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, werden {uip|SharedDamage|1054900271274ed5a11b7a8c5b1406d8} % dieses Schadens (bis max. 100 %) allen verbundenen Zielen als {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g} zugefügt. Nach der Aktivierung wird dieser Effekt entfernt.

Once triggered, this effect is removed.
